verses.name: Mark 2:8
verses.text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves, he said unto them, Why reason ye these things in your hearts?

verses.name: Mark 2:9
verses.text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and take up thy bed, and walk?

verses.name: Mark 2:10
verses.text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (he saith to the sick of the palsy,)

verses.name: Mark 2:11
verses.text: I say unto thee, Arise, and take up thy bed, and go thy way into thine house.
